text: DESC: Ziarat of Haleemah Sa'diyyah (ra) Haleemah Sa'diyyah was the foster mother of the Holy Prophet (saww). She took the Holy Prophet (saww) from his grandfather, Abdul Muttalib (as) to her tribe outside Mecca. She nursed him and brought him up there. She was a very kind and affectionate lady. She had the esteemed honour of being the foster mother of the Messenger of Allah (saww). The Holy Prophet (saww) also used to respect her.
Peace be upon you; O mother of Allah's Messenger!
Peace be upon you; O mother of Allah's Elite!
Peace be upon you; O mother of Allah's most beloved one !
Peace be upon you; O mother of the Chosen Prophet!
Peace be upon you; O nurse of Allah's Messenger!
Peace be upon you; O nurse of Allah's Messenger!
May Allah be pleased with you.
and may He please you and may He decide Paradise to be your house and abode!
Allah's mercy and blessings be upon you.
